Turns cameras into Linux webcams

Related repos

  • Turns any webcam into an IP camera
  • Camera app with encryption and no internet access
  • NVR interface for RTSP cameras with motion detection and HomeKit support
  • Monitors multiple 3D printer camera feeds in a browser
  • home video integration platform with smart camera support
  • real-time object detection in your browser using webcam and SmolVLM
  • Backs up dashcam footage to a server via a Raspberry Pi
  • Web screen recorder with camera overlay and keyboard shortcuts
